QuestData.Title: The Cure
QuestData.Description: Cowards! A curse on these wretched meatbags!$b$bThe Bladespire have always taunted the orc clans by taking our wounded as slaves to fight like dogs in their pits.$b$bIn retaliation for our assault they have poisoned their orc prisoners, leaving them to suffer and die an excruciating death.$b$bOnly their geomancers carry the antidote, traveler. Use it to cure the Frostwolf prisoners.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done the Frostwolf Clan a service, traveler. I shall be sure to tell Durotan of your deeds.
